revision.text: ==English== ===Etymology=== {{blend|en|X-ray|laser}} ===Noun=== {{en-noun}} # {{lb|en|science fiction}} An [[X-ray]] [[laser]]. #* '''1970''', Henry Lipson, ''Crystals and X-rays'' (page 190) #*: If we could produce a ''''Xaser'''', could we also produce an image of a crystal structure? #* '''1978''', ''Laser Focus'' (volume 14, issues 7-12, page 57) #*: Perhaps some day there will be an x-ray system — a '''xaser''' — although it will probably self-destruct on each operation. ===Anagrams=== * {{anagrams|en|a=aersx|raxes}}
